GSD37gautdhcu:570: yathā mṛdā adbhiriti samuccīyate tathā bhasmādibhirapi samuccayārtho visamāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:571: taisajādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmuktatvāt idaṃ śaucaṃ śarīrāvayavasyāmedhyaliptasya draṣṭavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:574: visraṃsanaṃ nirasanaṃ, tat mūtrapūrīṣasrehūṇāṃ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:578: ityanena siddhatvāt lepagandhāpakarṣaṇaṃ ca mṛtsalilaprakṣālanena kuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:580: ityatra yaduktaṃ cūrṇādinā annalepāpakarṣaṇaṃ tenāśakyamidaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:583: kathaṃ-tadgrahaṇenānnalepāpakarṣaṇamuktaṃ tadapakarṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataācāmedityevamarthaṃ anyathā sandehaḥ syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:584: tathā cāpastambaḥ 'mūtraṃ kṛtvā pūrīṣaṃ vā mūtrapurīṣalepānannalepānucchiṣṭalepān
GSD37gautdhcu:585: retasaśca ye lepāstān prakṣālya pādau cācamya prayato bhavati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:593: sa yatra yajñaviṣaye sphyādīnāṃ prakṣālanamātrādeva śuddhiṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva,
GSD37gautdhcu:595: atulyabalatvādevedaṃ siddhamiti cet śrutyuktasya laukike ananupraveśanārtha upanyāsaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:596: yathār davyā yāgaviṣaye śrutyā prakṣālanena śuddhiruktā,
GSD37gautdhcu:598: darvīsāmānyena śrutyuktā mā bhūt smṛtyuktāmeva kuryādityevamarthamupanyāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:600: sa yatra śaucaṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva, yathā 'yatīnāṃ tu caturguṇam'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:601: taduktatvādevāsandeha iti cet ucyate- yasminviṣaye na kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantaroktaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:602: yatra lepagandhāpakarṣaṇādi kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantareṇa vikalpaśaṅkā bhavatīti tannirāsārthamuktaṃ 'yatra cāmnāyo vidadhyāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:603: evaṃ ca lepagandhāpakarṣaṇe kṛte 'pi 'dviguṇaṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ'; ityevamādyāśrayaṇīyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:605: pāṇinā savyamupasaṅgṛhyānaṅguṣṭhamadhīhi bho ityāmantrayeta gurum // Gaut_1.52 //
GSD37gautdhcu:606: pāṇinā dakṣiṇena savyaṃ pāṇimanaṅguṣṭhavarjitaṃ gṛhītvā adhīhi bho iti prārthayeta gurumadhyāpakam /
GSD37gautdhcu:622: prāṇāyāmaḥ prāṇanirodhaḥ nirucchvāsenāvasthānaṃ, te trayaḥ kāryāḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:640: savyena savyaḥ spṛṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:650: anujñāta upaviśetprāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukho vā // Gaut_1.60 //
GSD37gautdhcu:651: ācāryeṇādiṣṭaḥ tasya dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vopaviśet saṃbhavato vikalpaḥ āsīnasyācāryasya yathā tadabhimukho bhavati tathā prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā upaviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:654: 'anujñāto dakṣiṇataḥ'; iti ca niyamārthaḥ nānanujñāta upaviśennādakṣiṇata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:661: tripadā caiva gāyatrī vijñeyā brahmaṇo mukham //
GSD37gautdhcu:676: sāvitrī cānuvacanaṃ tato 'dhīyīteti vaktavye ādito brahmaṇa ādāna ityārambhāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:683: yadyadhīyatāmantarā madhye kaścidgacchettataḥ punarapi pādopasaṅgrahaṇādipraṇavoccāraṇānto yo vidhistaṃ kuryāttasya prāyaścittārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:693: śvādīnāṃ pratyekamantarā manage tryahaṃ bhaktatyāgaḥ prāyaścittaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:715: tatastrīnprāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ghṛtaṃ prāśyopasadanaṃ ca kṛtvādhīyīta, anadhyāyāśravaṇāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:721: tathā cāhośanā- 'anabhisandhyā śmaśānābhyadhyayane 'dhīhi bho ityuktvādhīyīta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:722: cakārādanantaroktasya praṇāyāmādeḥ sarvasya prāptau evaṃśabdena anantaroktasyopasadanasyaiva prāptiḥ kriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:723: tarhyevaṃśabda eva vaktavya iti cet na, ubhayasakāśa evāyamartho labhyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:725: evaṃśabde caśabde vā vaktavye ubhayapāṭhasya prayojanāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ nyāyyaṃ, na hyekasyaiveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:727: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'śmaśānasamīpe 'dhītya prāṇān dhārayet prāṇopasparśanamabhivādanaṃ sāvitryanuvācanaṃ'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:730: kiñca-sarvatra sopasadanameva prāyaścittaṃ, upasadanaṃ tvabhivādanādi, tadabhivādanamācāryasya
GSD37gautdhcu:738: nanu ca prāgevopanayanādetadvaktavyaṃ, tatra prāgupanayanādityetanna vaktavyaṃ bhavati //
GSD37gautdhcu:747: ataḥ idaṃ sūtramanuvādakaṃ prāyaścittarājadaṇḍābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ, tayoḥ sāmānyenopadiśṭatvāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:748: nanu ca rājadaṇḍaprāyaścittāni ca vihitākaraṇe niṣiddhasevane vā vidhīyante /
GSD37gautdhcu:751: na cāsya vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā śrūyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:756: atrocyate-yadvihitākaraṇe pratipiddhasevane vā prāyaścittamuktaṃ rājadaṇḍo vā tadubhayamasyāpi prāpnotyeva /
GSD37gautdhcu:757: yadyapyasyaivoddeśena vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā na śrūyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:763: ityanena sūtreṇa upanayanādārabhya yo vidhirucyate-tadvyatikrame eva prāyaścittaṃ nānyavyatikrame iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:764: tenaivāsyāpi varṇadhramātikrame prāyaścittābhāvo jñātuṃ śakyate, rājadaṇḍābhāvo 'pi /
GSD37gautdhcu:765: tathāpi nityopanayanakālātītasya bhinnabuddheḥ śaktasya ekādaśavarṣādūrdhvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣātprāk prāyaścittārdhapraveśanārthaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:779: tadvyatikrame bālasya sataḥ pitrādīnāṃ prāyaścittasya śravaṇāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:781: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vivriyate-upanayanātprākkāmacāra icchāgatiḥ tasmāccaṇḍālasparśanādau prokṣaṇamātraṃ vakṣyati 'avokṣaṇebhyaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:794: kāmavāde abhiśaṃsādau kāmabhakṣaṇe surāpānādau cātyantavālyāvasthāyāmapi yatnato nivārayitavya-,
GSD37gautdhcu:796: upanayanāditi vaktavye prāggrahaṇaṃ niyamārthaṃ, upanayanātprāgeva kāmacāritvādīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:801: hutaṃ hutaśiṣṭaṃ carupuroḍāśādi, na vaiśvadevaśiṣṭaṃ, tasya sarvārthatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:810: yathāpariveṣṭitaśirasaḥ kṛṣṭādāvapi mūtrapurīṣāvutpadyete tiṣṭhato vā tathā tatraiva kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:823: asyonapañcavarṣasyāpamārjanādibhyaḥ anyatra kiñcidapi śaucaprakāraḥ na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:840: dvayameva prayojanaṃ śaucavidhānasya dṛśyate itarasparśayogyārthamanuṣṭhānārthaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:841: asya tu itarasparśayogyārthaṃ na bhavati, akṛtaśaucasyāpi sparśayogyatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:851: aśuciṃ spṛśate yastu eka eva hi duṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:852: taṃ spṛṣṭvānyo na duṣyeta sarvadravyeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:867: kāmacāritvādyatrakutracinmantramadhītyāgnihotrādau yadi svayameva pravartate tadā taṃ dṛṣṭvānumantāpi na syādityevamartha evaśabdaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:869: evaṃ ca 'vidvānāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt'; iti yadyapi śrutyā bahuśrutasyaivādhikāraḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:872: naiva kanyā na yuvatirnālpavidyo na bāliśaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:875: tatrālpavidyapratiṣedhādeva pratiṣedhe siddhe nāsaṃskṛta iti pratiṣedho 'nyasya viduṣo 'bhāvelpavidyasyāpi saṃskṛtasyābhyanujñānārthamiti pratipāditam /
GSD37gautdhcu:877: kutaḥ ? 'vaivāhiko vidhiḥ strīṇāmaupanāyanikaḥ smṛtaḥ'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:878: evaṃ cāgnihavanabalirharaṇayoḥ kanyāyā api niyogapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:880: tatra 'na strī juhuyāt'; iti śrutyāgnihotre pratiṣiddhatvāt aupāsanādau draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:881: tathā ca smṛtyantaraṃ-'patnyaupāsanaṃ juhuyādvaiśvadevaṃ ca'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:889: ityanena vedādhyayanavidhānādevānupanītasya pratiṣedhe siddhe vedasya punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ veda eva nādhyāpayitavyaḥ iti niyamārthaḥ tataścāṅgādhyāpane na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:893: amuṣmai svadhetyuktvā yatpiṇḍodakādi pretebhyo dīyate tatsvadhāninayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:897: sati sapiṇḍādibhiḥ pretakriyā na kartavyā, śāstracodanānarthakyaprasaṅgo mā bhūditi //
GSD37gautdhcu:900: upanayanādārabhya yo vidhiruktaḥ sa niyamasaṃjño bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:902: ato vā ārabhya niyamaḥ vratadhāraṇaṃ yo vakṣyate 'gnīndhanādiḥ sa niyamaḥ upanayanādiḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:909: brahmacāriṇastu strīprekṣaṇādipratiṣedhādarthasiddhamiti cet, na, paśvādaṣvapi sambhavāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:920: tatrāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgnimityanena samiddhoma ukta ityuktam /
GSD37gautdhcu:922: iti dvirbhojanaśravaṇāt sāyaṃ prātaḥ dviragnīndhanamapi draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:943: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ vrāhyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:945: āpo hiṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:946: yattu syātsātapaṃ varṣaṃ divyaṃ snānaṃ taducyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:952: agnīndhanabhaikṣacaraṇayoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇaṃ bhuktasya nityasnānapratiṣedhārthaṃ, na naimittikasya /
GSD37gautdhcu:961: godānaṃ nāma chandogānāṃ dvitīyaṃ vrataṃ anyeṣāmapi ṣoḍaśe varṣe dhārayitavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:964: godānāt prāk nityasnānaṃ na kuryāt, naimittikameva kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:966: eka iti vacanāt na tu gautamaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:973: bahirabhyantare vā yatra kutra cicchuddhadeśe kartavyamiti gautamamatam //
GSD37gautdhcu:974: idānīṃ prasaṅgāt tat sandhyopāsanaṃ kadā kathaṃ ca kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:982: ato yadyapi tiṣṭhedityuktaṃ, tathāpi tiṣṭhannupāsīta, āsīna upāsīteti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:985: paścimāṃ tu samāsīno malaṃ hanti divā kṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:988: yaḥ kālo nakṣatrajyotiṣā saha vartata sa sajyotiḥ tasmin sajyotiṣi kāle ārambhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:990: tata ā jyotiṣo darśanāt-pūrvasyāmādityadarśanāt uttarasyāṃ nakṣatradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:991: ā jyotiṣa iti vaktavye darśanagrahaṇaṃ sampagartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:994: prajñāṃ yaśaśca kīrtiṃ ca brahmavarcasameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:996: nanu ca 'uttareṣāṃ caitadavirodhi'; ityanena snātakasyāgnimata etanna prāpyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:1008: tathā'hośanā-'sāyaṃ prātarudakaṃ gatvā pūto bhūtvā pavitreṇa mārjayitvā āpohiṣṭhīyābhistisṛbhirabliṅgābhiḥ vāmadevyena ca,
GSD37gautdhcu:1009_0: tataḥ śuco deśe darbheṣvāsīno darbhāndhārayamāṇaḥ pratyaṅmukho vāgyata ātmānaṃ dhyātvā
GSD37gautdhcu:1009_1: tataḥ sarecakaṣūrakakumbhakādīn trīn prāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ṛṣicchabdodevatādhyānapūrvakaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1009_2: bhūrbhuvaḥsvarityādikāṃ sāvitrīṃ sahasrakṛtva āvartayecchatakṛtvo vā daśāvarāmathottiṣṭhamnagniyamabrahmabhyaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1009_3: pratyagdakṣiṇodīcyāsu namaskṛtvā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā punarapi pratīcīṃ diśaṃ namaskuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1013: yadi sandhyākālayorevāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadānīmekameva sūtraṃ kriyeta 'tiṣṭhetpūrvāmāsītottarāṃ sajyotipyā jyotiṣo darśanādvāgyato nādityamīkṣeta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1017: abhiprāyaśca smṛtyantarokto draṣṭavyaḥ yathā cāhośanā-'nekṣetādityaṃ sandhyāgataṃ madhyaṃdinagataṃ rāhugrastaṃ vāristham'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1022: 'akāmopanataṃ madhu vājasaneyake na duṣyati'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1024: tatrāpyāturasyauṣadhārthaṃ gurorucchiṣṭasya māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1025: 'sa cedavyādhīyīta kāmaṃ gurorucchiṣṭaṃ bhaiṣajyārthe sarvaṃ prāśnīyāt'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1036: divāsvapno divā nidrāsevanaṃ, tadapyāturasya na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1043: viśeṣata eva lokaprasiddherna gandhasāmānyasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1056: tāmbūlapatreṇāpi tanna kartavyaṃ 'paṅkadanto bhavedvratī'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1057: harṣaḥ prītiḥ evaṃ ca taddhetūnāṃ nāṭakādīnāṃ prekṣaṇasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1066: kutaḥ ? yadyācāryasyaiva grahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ ācāryadarśana iti vaktavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1068: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'manyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sakāśe saṃkucitastiṣṭhet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1078: tathā cāpastambaḥ-'na smayeta yadi smayetāpapṛhya smayeteti brāhmaṇaṃ'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1097: evaṃ ca gurorapyanurūpā sevā na kartavyā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1104: ācāryasya tatputrasya ca tadbhāryāyāśca dīkṣitasya ca saṃjñāṃ pitrādikṛtāṃ noccārayet //
GSD37gautdhcu:1111: madyaṃ guḍamadhupiṣṭakṛtaṃ anyadapi yanmadakaraṃ yatsarvaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ prāgapyupanayanādvarjayet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1112: evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ prāgupanayanādūrdhvaṃ ca brahmacaryāt paiṣṭīvarjitāyāḥ surāyā apratiṣedhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1115: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1116: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijottamaiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1142: ācāryaṃ caiva tatputraṃ tadbhāryāṃ dīkṣitaṃ gurum /
GSD37gautdhcu:1143: pitaraṃ ca pitṛvyaṃ ca mātaraṃ mātulaṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1144: hitaiṣiṇaṃ ca vidvāṃsaṃ śvaśuraṃ patimeva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1145: na brūyānnāmato vidvān mātuśca bhaginīṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1146: yadi brūyāttu taṃ dhyātvā namaskṛtvā vadedatha //
GSD37gautdhcu:1150: śreyān hitaiṣī vayasā ca vṛddha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1157: etāni vihāya tyaktvā pratiśravaṇaṃ prativacanaṃ dadyādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1159: adṛṣṭena guruṇā ājñāyāṃ dīyamānāyāṃ abhikramaṇaṃ tadabhimukhena gamanaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1161: yadā guruḥ adho nīcaiḥ tiṣṭhet āsīta vā, tiryagvātasevā mūtrapurīṣotsargaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1165: kūpasthitaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā taṭākasthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1169: evaṃ sūtrārthaśca tadānīṃ draṣṭavyaḥ adhaḥsthānāsanatiryagvātasevāyāmuttiṣṭhet apayāyācca krameṇeti tatrādhaḥsthānāsane dṛṣṭvottiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1174: tena anuktamapi samuccīyate āsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā uttiṣṭhet śayānaṃ dṛṣṭvā'sīteti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1179: yadasya karma kartavyaṃ tatkaromītyācāryasya vijñāpya tatkṛtvā kṛtamityākhyāya tiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1181: ākhyāyetyatrāpi tiṣṭhediti kriyā ca, 'praviśa piṇḍīm'; itivat //
GSD37gautdhcu:1193: tasya yau savarṇau sadṛśau bhāryāputrau tayorapi priyahitayoryuktaḥsyāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1201_0: tathācāpastambaḥ-'proṣito bhaikṣādagnau kṛtvā bhuñjīta bhaikṣaṃ haviṣā saṃstutaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1201_1: tatrācāryo devatārtha āhavanīyārthe ca taṃ bhojayitvā yaducchiṣṭaṃ prāśnāti havirucchaṣṭameva tat'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1213: yuvatīnāṃ taruṇīnāṃ viproṣyāpi na kāryamityeke manyante na tu
GSD37gautdhcu:1217: tatrāgnīndhanaṃ gṛhyebhya eva pṛthakpṛthagupalabhyata iti, bhaikṣacaraṇavidhimāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1220: bhaikṣacaraṇaṃ tāvadanena na vidhīyate 'agnīndhanabhaikṣacaraṇe'; ityanena vihitatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1224: na cānāpadyapi brahmacāriṇaḥ śūdrābhyanujñānamanena kalpayituṃ yuktaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1229: tasmādanāpadyeva brahmacāriṇaḥ apraśastadvijātiprāpaṇārthoyamārambhaḥ apraśastānāmaviśeṣeṇa prāptau satyāṃ 'abhiśastapatitavarjaṃ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1231: itarathā śūdraprāpaṇe sati abhiśastādīnāṃ prāptyabhāvādeva pratiṣedho na yujyata iti na ca śakyate vaktuṃ śūdraviṣaya evāyamapavāda iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1232: yatra hi dvijātayaḥ praśastā adhikriyante tatra śūdro 'pi praśasta eveti itarasya prasaṅga eva nāstīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1233: tena prathamakalpastāvat brahmacāriṇaḥ praśastebhya eva bhaikṣacaraṇaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1240: varṇagrahaṇaṃ śūdrasyāpi prāpaṇārthaṃ asati varṇagrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇaṃ tayoreva syāditi tadarthaṃ varṇagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1242: tataśca śūdrasyāpi vṛttihīnasya bhikṣācaraṇe na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1243: bhikṣāsamūho bhaikṣaṃ, tataśca bahubhyo gṛhebhya āhartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1244: abhiśasta upapātakadoṣeṇābhiśasto gṛhyate, pātakadoṣeṇābhiśastasya patitagrahaṇenaiva siddhatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1246: kecitsarveṣu varṇeṣu bhavaṃ sārvavarṇikamiti vigrahaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ sarvaśabdasya prayojanaṃ na vidmaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1250: dvipadasya bhikṣāṃ dehīti śabdasya prārthanāyāṃ dehītyasyāpi ca sārmathyāt prāptasyādau brāhmaṇena bhavacchabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1252: bhavacchabdasya prātipadikatvātkevalasya ca prayogābhāvāt strīṇāṃ sakāśe tadāmantritavibhaktyantaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1257: yathāha gṛhyasmṛtiḥ 'brāhmaṇo bhikṣeta bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehīti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1260: kṣāṃ ca hiṃ ca na vardhayet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1261: varṇagrahaṇaṃ śūdrasya mantraprāpaṇārthaṃ, tataśca trayāṇāmeva varṇānāmanyatamo mantro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1274: teṣāṃ yo yaḥ prathamanirdiṣṭaḥ tatra tatra pariharet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1275: anyatrālābhe pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ parihṛtyāpi teṣāmeva sakāśe
GSD37gautdhcu:1281: idaṃ bhaikṣamiti gurave kathayitvā tato bhuṃkṣveti tenānujñāto bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdhcu:1282: evañca nivedanaṃ bhaikṣasaṃskārārthaṃ, anujñāta iti vacanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1306: tathaiva manurapi mekhalādibhiḥ saha pratipattividhānāt brahmacāriṇaḥ kamaṇḍaludhāraṇaṃ jñāpayati-
GSD37gautdhcu:1314: apsu pāṇau ca kāṣṭhe ca kalpitaḥ pāvakaḥ śuciḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1318: idānīṃ yadi brahmacārī guroḥ samyagvinayenāvatiṣṭheta tadānīṃ kiṃ kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1320: śiṣyāśiṣṭiḥ śiṣyaśāsanaṃ, avadhena vadhaṃ muktvā, nirrbhatsanādinā kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1321: adhikārādeva siddhe śiṣyagrahaṇamanyasyāpi śāsanīyasya bhāryāputrāderayameva dharma iti jñāpanārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1337: sarveṣu vedeṣu yāvataiva kālenādhyayanamabhinirvartayet tāvantameva kālaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caret tasya tadarthatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1338: sarvagrahaṇaṃ yadyekamadhīyīta yadi vā dvau yadi vā sarvānityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1340: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1347: gururācāryaḥ arthena prayojanena nimantryaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ gurvarthe karavāṇīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1351: tena vā alaṃ gurudakṣiṇayetyanujñātasya snānaṃ samāvṛttiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1352: idānīṃ pitrādyanekagurusannidhāne kaḥ prathamaḥ pūjya ityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1354: ācārya uktalakṣaṇaḥ, sa śreṣṭhaḥ pradhāno gurūṇāṃ anyeṣāṃ pitrādīnām /
GSD37gautdhcu:1367: yadi pitaivācāryo bhavati tadā pitā viśiṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1372: ityatra pitṛśabdena pitaivācāryo yo bhavati sa eva gṛhyata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1380: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1384: śūdraparyudāsārthaṃ vā tadgrahaṇaṃ, āśramadharmābhidhānaṃ mā bhūttasyāpīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1385: vīpsārthaṃ vā tasya tasyeti, brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya ceti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1387: evaṃ hi smṛtyantaraṃ pratibhāti-“eṣa vo 'bhihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya caturvidhaḥ“iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1388: tatra brāhmaṇasyaivāyaṃ caturvidho dharmaḥ itarayorekavidha ityāśaṅkā syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1389: tarhi tatkathamiti cet tatra brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1390: tatkathaṃ gamyata iti cet trayāṇāmeva varṇānāṃ catvāra āśramā iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1391: tathā cāpastambaḥ-“sarveṣāmupanayanaprabhṛti samānamācāryakule vāsaḥ sarveṣāmanūtsargo vidyāyā buddhvā karmāṇi yatkāmayettadārabheta“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1393: dvividhaṃ hi phalamabhyudayarūpaṃ niḥśreyasarūpaṃ ceti, tadanyatamenava labhyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1394: tathā ca śrutiḥ-“trayo dharmaskandhā yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamastapa eva dvitīyastṛtīyamācāryakule vasanametānāruhya brahmalokaṃ gacchati brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvameti“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1406: tathā jābālaśrutāvapi tulyaphalataiva śrūyate-'brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhavet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1409: yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet gṛhādvā vanādvā brahmalokaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1415: āpastambopyāha-'catvāra āśramā gārhasthyamācāryakule vasanaṃ maunaṃ vānapraśthyāmiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1416: teṣu sarveṣu yathopadeśamavyagraṃ vartamānaḥ kṣemaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1419: ucyate- yo yasyānuṣṭhāne samarthaḥ tasya tadāśramapratipattyarthaṃ itarāśramavidhānamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1423: evaṃ gṛhīte vyutthānaśrutirapyupapadyate-'evaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā putreṣaṇāyāśca vitteṣaṇāyāśca lokeṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1424: itarathā hi bhikṣācaryamiti saṃnyāsopadeśo nopapadyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1431: tataśca padārtho 'pyevaṃ grahītavyaḥ-gṛhastho jāyamānaḥ pūrvavāsanayā gārhasthyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1433: tribhiḥ ṝṇaiḥ sambadhyate-yajñena devebhya ṝṇī bhavatyato yajñaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1435: brahmacaryeṇa ṝṣibhyaḥ ataḥ parvādau brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1437: ekegrahaṇānna tu gautamaḥ, tasya tu samuccayo mataḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1446: brahmalokaprāpterapi samuccayaphalatvenopadiṣṭatvāt jābālaśrutāvapi prādhānyena pūrvaṃ samuccayapakṣasyaivābhihitatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1448: āpastambavākye 'pi teṣu sarveṣviti bahuvacanāt- naikasminneva vartamānaḥ kiṃ tu sarveṣveva vartamāna ityabhiprāyeṇoktatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1451: yāvajjīvaśruterapi“gṛhī vanaṃ praviśedyadi gṛhameva kāmayeta tadā yāvajjīvasagnihotraṃ juhuyāt“iti jābālaśrutivākye anityatvadarśanāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1457: asamartho yaḥ samuccayānuṣṭhāne andhapaṅgutvādidoṣeṇa niḥsvatvādinā vā tena vikalpapakṣo 'pyāśrayaṇīyaḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa bruvata ityarthasiddhasyāpyupanyāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1458: athavā-yo 'dhyātmajñānī tena vikalpapakṣa āśrayaṇīyaḥ,itareṇa samuccayapakṣa iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1460: tasminnutpanne yatra kvāpyāśrame sthitasya puruṣārthaḥ sidhyatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1464: brahmacaryaṃ caratīti, brahmaṇa eva vā viṣaye niḥspṛhaścaratīti, brahmacārī /
GSD37gautdhcu:1467: vikhanasā proktaṃ śāstraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tadvidhinā vartata iti vaikhānasaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1474: nanu ca smṛtyantare vaikhānasamabhidhāya bhikṣurityuktaḥ iha kimarthaṃ kramabheda iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1484: iti smṛtyantaramavalambya gārhasthyādeva saṃnyāsaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaḥ kramabheda iti varṇayanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1490: evaṃ ca vaikhānasasya sapatnīkatvapakṣe 'pi brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1491: adhikārādeva siddhe 'teṣāṃ'; grahaṇaṃ gṛhasthotpannānāmeva teṣāṃ dharme ādhikāra ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1495: iti teṣāṃ gṛhastha eva yonirityukte evakārādevetareṣāṃ brahmacaryarakṣaṇe siddhe evamabhidhānameṣāṃ punarnivṛttirmā bhūditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1496: yadi te gārhasthyaṃ prati nivṛtti bhaveyuḥ tadā te caṇḍālā bhavanti kutaḥ ? udāhṛtaśātātapavacanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1498: pratyavasitāḥ pratinivṛttāḥ ye parivrājakatāpasāḥ naiṣṭhikavaikhānasāḥ tasmātteṣāṃ jātānyapatyāni caṇḍālaiḥsahavāsayedrājā grāmo vetyarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1499: idānīmāśramadharmeṣu krameṇa vaktavyeṣu prāpteṣu sarvāśramasāmyādupakurvāṇasya pūrvamuktvā naiṣṭhikasya krameṇa prāptaṃ vaktumāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1502: nanu ca naiṣṭikasyaivedaṃ nopakurvāṇasyeti kathaṃ jñāyata iti ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1504: tarhi brahmacārigrahaṇaṃ kimartamiti cet yenopakurvāṇavratamanuṣṭhitaṃ tasyaiva
GSD37gautdhcu:1512: evaṃ ca japa evāsya viśiṣṭaṃ dharmasādhanamiti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1513: ācārya iti prakṛte gurugrahaṇaṃ mātāpitrorapi śuśrūṣāprāpaṇārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1515: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ śuśrūṣā paramaṃ tapa ucyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1519: gurorabhāve tadapatye śuśrūṣā, adhyāpayiturabhāve tadapatye śuśrūṣeti niyamārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1528: evaṃ yathopadeśaṃ vartamāno brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānamavāpnoti sa cejjitendriyo bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:1531: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā ca yo nara /
GSD37gautdhcu:1532: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sa vijñeyo jitendriyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1537: yadbrahmacāriṇa uktaṃ taduttareṣāmapi bhavati yadaviruddhaṃ dyūtādivarjanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1541: caśabdaḥ uttarasya yadvakṣyamāṇaṃ tadapyaviruddhaṃ pūrveṣāmapi bhavatīti jñāpayati,
GSD37gautdhcu:1547: tasyābhidhīyamānāḥ dharmāḥ aviruddhāḥ kecitkathaṃ nāma pūrveṣāṃ syuriti tadarthaṃ vyutkrameṇābhidhānam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1548: tarhi vaikhānasasya vaktavya iti cet, upanyāsakrameṇoktatvādadoṣaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1550: anicayaśabdenaupacayikadravyasya tyāga ucyate, na nityadravyasya śikhāyajñopavītādeḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1551: nanu ca nityasyaiva tyāgo yuktaḥ upavītaśabdena nyāsaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1556: na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅge na cele na tripuṣkare //
GSD37gautdhcu:1557: nāgāre nāsane nānne yasya syānmokṣavittu saḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1559: jābālaśrutāvapi-'nakhāni nikṛtya yajñopavītaṃ visṛjya'; iti yajñopavītasya
GSD37gautdhcu:1561: ucyate-prathamaṃ tāvadyaduktaṃ yajñādhikārābhāvāt iti tatra yāgaśabdo devapūjanādāvapi vartate devapūjanaṃ tvasya dhyānena paramātmapūjanāmastyeva kutaḥ ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1565_1: śabdādayo hotā etai ṛtvigbhistena sruveṇa taddhaviraharaharyatinā paramātmanyagnau hotavyam'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1568: iti tatrāpi kuṇḍikādīnāṃ vaicitryavarjanārthaḥ saṅgasyaiva parityāgaḥ, na kuṇḍikādeḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1572: iti sarvāśramādhikārāt sāmānyatvena vartamāno 'pi viśeṣadharmeṇa bādhyata iti cet,
GSD37gautdhcu:1577: iti nirdeśaḥ sarvāśramādhikāranivṛttyartha iti jñātuṃ śakyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1578: tatastatra sarvāśramādhikārābhāvāt pūrvāparavirodhaprasaṅgo mā bhūditi 'na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1579: iti saṅgamātrasyaiva tyāgaḥ kriyata iti grahītuṃ śakyata eveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1581: tasmāttenāpi na kuṇḍyādīnāṃ tyāgaḥ yaccoktam-'nakhāni nikṛtya yajñopavītaṃ visṛjya';
GSD37gautdhcu:1582: iti tatrāpi prathamaṃ saṃnyāsāśramapraveśakāle purāṇasya yajñopavītasya tyāgamātraṃ kriyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:1585: 'nakhāni nikṛtya purāṇaṃ vastraṃ yajñopavītaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ tyaktvā navāni gṛhītvā'śramaṃ praviśet';
GSD37gautdhcu:1590: 'muṇḍaśikhī vā'; iti muṇḍapakṣe ācamanāṅgaśikhāvarjitasyāpi ācamanaṃ yuṣmābhirabhyupagamyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:1594: yuṣmākaṃ tu yajñopavītaṃ tyaktavyamiti vacanābhāvāddoṣa eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1595: bhikṣuranicaya iti vaktavye dharmāsyādāvabhidhānaṃ nityasyāgnihotradārāderapi tyāgārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1596: evaṃ ca gārhasthyādeva yaḥ pravrajet tena śrautasya ca smārtasya cāgneḥ dāraputraprapañcayajñādisahitasya tyāgaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1598: vaisānasādeva yaḥ pravrajet tatrāpi sapatnīkapakṣe prāptasya dārasya śrāmaṇakāgnisahitasya pañcayajñāderapi tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1602: iti japasyaiva pradhānatvenopadiṣṭatvāt tenaivāgniparigrahāderapyabhāvo jñātuṃ śakyata eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1605: ityanena brahmacāriṇaḥ uktena brahmacaryarakṣaṇenāsyāpi siddherūrdhvaretograhaṇaṃ yathā yathā retasaḥ kṣayo bhavati tathā tathopāyaḥ kartavya ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1618: varṣāsviti bahuvacanāt grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ caturṣu māseṣu na gacchedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1621: tathāca smṛtyantaram- 'grāmānte devagṛhe śūnyāgāre vṛkṣamūle vā'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1622: śīlagrahaṇaṃ ca kurvannetat jñāpayati, nāvaśyamevaṃ bhavet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1626: tadarthaṃ grāmaṃ gacchet arthāccheṣaṃ kālamaraṇye devāyatanādau tiṣṭhediti siddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1634: anivṛttaṃ yasmin gṛhe pratyākhyātaṃ tasmindine tadgrahaṃ punarna praviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1636: yathā'ha vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vidhūme sannamusale ekaśāṭhīparihito 'jinena vā'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1646: dharmayogaṃ pathipraśnaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1652: idānīṃ 'anicayo bhikṣuḥ'; ityanena sarvasyaipacayikadravyasya parityāge sati pratiprasavaḥ kriyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1662: eke manyante pratigrahadoṣaparihārārthaṃ prahīṇaṃ yadrathyādau tyaktaṃ tatprakṣālya paridadhyāt nirṇijyeti pratyātmikaśaucaprāpaṇārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1669: cet, tatra jaṅgamavadha eva hiṃseti kecidvadanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1675: apagate ṛtau dvitīyāṃ rātriṃ grāme na vaset /
GSD37gautdhcu:1678: apartugrahaṇādvarṣāsu kadācit dvitīyāmapi vasato na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1680: tataśca tasminvarṣākāle ekatraiva vasedanyatra na vasedityarthasiddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1685: bījānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ vadhaṃ avahananādi na kuryāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:1722: araṇye 'pi phālakṛṣṭapradeśaṃ nākrāmeta, āvāsaṃ tatra na kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1723: ākrāmediti siddhe adhitiṣṭhediti vacanaṃ pramādādākramato doṣābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1742: aikāśramyaṃ tvācāryaḥ pratyakṣavidhānāt gārhasthasya gārhasthasya // Gaut_3.36 //
